text: In the scientific discipline of economics, the Econometric Society is a learned society devoted to the advancement of economics by using mathematical and statistical methods. This article is a list of its (current and in memory) fellows. ==Fellows== ===1933=== * Luigi Amoroso * Oskar N. Anderson * Albert Aupetit * * A. L.
